      • readBlock

        public BlockData readBlock(RequestContext ctx,
                  Block block,
                  long offset,
                  int length)
                    throws IOException,
                           org.apache.thrift.TException
        Description copied from interface: Datanode.Iface
        Read bytes from a block. Only 2^31 - 1 bytes may be read on a single call to this method.
        Specified by:
        readBlock in interface Datanode.Iface
        block - Block to be read from.
        offset - Offset within the block where read must start from.
        length - Number of bytes to read.
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.thrift.TException
